class.name: CATEpeObject

method.name: ExecuteCriterion
method.abstract: Executes the current Criterion.

method.abstract: Executes the current Criterion queries.

method.abstract: Closes Reconciliation Session.

define.name: CATEpeNodeDocument

define.abstract: Constant value to define the node type for an Assembly relation.

class.name: CATIPDMCharacteristicScm
class.abstract: Interface used by the Reconciliator in order to display and compare the characteristics of an object between its CATIA session and VPDM repository.

method.name: ExecuteCharacteristic
method.abstract: Executes the characteristic on defined PDM.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Provides characteristic name.

method.name: IsApplicable
method.abstract: Answers if the characteristic is applicable to an object.

class.name: CATIPDMCriterionScm
class.abstract: Interface used by the Reconciliator in order to query in a PDM Destination for candidate objects for reconciliation.

method.name: CheckCriterionParametersXML
method.abstract: Checks query parameters values.

method.name: ExecuteCriterion
method.abstract: Executes current query on PDM.

method.name: ExecuteCriterionXML
method.abstract: Executes current query on VPDM with query parameters inside an XML stream .

method.name: GetCriterionMode
method.abstract: Define how criterion operates.

method.name: GetCriterionParameters
method.abstract: Gets the list of parameters and default values of the PDM objects' query.

method.name: GetCriterionParametersXML
method.abstract: Gets query parameters with default values.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Provides criterion name.

method.name: GetOrderIndex
method.abstract: Gets order index.

method.name: IsApplicable
method.abstract: Answers if the criterion is applicable to an object.

class.name: CATIPDMUERecEventScm
class.abstract: This interface allows the customer to be called back.

method.name: OnAfterReconciliationApply
method.abstract: Allows to add specific control after synchronization.

method.name: OnAfterStructureComparison
method.abstract: Allows to refine Product structure comparison results.

method.name: OnSessionInitialization
method.abstract: Allows to prepare Reconciliation session.

class.name: CATIUExitPVRCommands
class.abstract: Interface to allow the user to implement customize behavior in context of Product View Result Creation or Synchronization.

method.name: AfterPRCOpenFromPVR
method.abstract: User Exit called after opening a PRC from PVR specication.

method.name: GetDefaultNamesForPVRCreation
method.abstract: Enables to define default name to be used in Product View Result (PVR) document creation command.

method.name: UpdateAttributeOnPvrSynchro
method.abstract: Enables to update an attribute value on PVR document.
